price: 36. Maar Wij vonden geen enkel huis van de gelovigen, behalve één (van Loet).
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
